transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan madam, mai kal connect karta hu aapko.
Customer: Haan sir, 5 minute chahiye tha agar, waise bas aap mujhe bata dete ki kya kya product ka aap search kar rahe ho, mai wo product ke naam se hi product add kar deti.
Hmm.
Executive: Aapko dalna hai video.
Customer: Usme na, mai batati hu, jab bhi aap search karte ho na, aap koi keyword dalte ho. Jaise maine dekha aapne
Executive: Student abacus dala hai na, master abacus, 13 rod master abacus.
Customer: Kya dala aapne? 13 rod master abacus, right?
Haa.
Customer: To ye aap product ke naam se search kar rahe ho. Preferred star hum student abacus aur abacus book me chala rahe hain. To jab hum ye product ka naam specific add kar denge na us category me, to bhi preferred star me hamari aayegi. Jaise abhi, for example, aap jao Google pe aap 13 rod
[inaudible] student abacus search karo.
Executive: Ye customer ko aap bol rahe hai, customer ko, ye customer ko kaun bolega?
Customer: Nahi nahi, ye to product ka naam to aapne dala hi hua hai na, mai to product ke naam se hi baat kar rahi hu. Jaise 13 rod multi colour student abacus. Ye to product search karega hi na, is naam se to search karega hi customer. Waise hi aap mujhe aur product ke naam bata do, mai wo product add kar dungi, aapke hisab se jaise customer search karta ho. To usme bhi listing aa jayegi apne preferred star me.
Executive: To 49 product humne add kiye hai.
Customer: Student abacus, master abacus.
Executive: Teacher abacus.
Executive: 13 rod master abacus.
Customer: Specific. Hmm. Jaise aapne 15 rod student abacus dala hai. Aap ye search karke dekho.
Executive: Haa.
Customer: Aapko dikhega.
Executive: Mere ko nahi search karna hai, customer ko search karna hai. Customer kaise bhi search kare, usko to nahi bolenge, aap bolte hai kya unko batate hai kya? Acha aisa search karo, waisa search karo.
Customer: Nahi nahi, hum nahi batate, lekin hum isiliye to product ka naam aapke hisab se add karte hai. Kyuki pata hota hai na customer kis naam se search karega.
Executive: Haa to wo to yaar kiya hua hai na, baki ke dikh rahe hai na. Apna dikh nahi raha hai na, ye hai na.
Customer: Abhi jaise aapne mujhe jo video search share kari thi. Haa to kuch na kuch naam se search kiya hoga na maine. Aaya na. Aapne teacher abacus 13 rod dala tha. To aapne naam se
Executive: Haa to kuch naam se kuch kuch naam se to search kiya, kuch to dala hai na. Usse bhi dala hai na.
Customer: Searching me.
Executive: Acha aapka point ye hai ki kuch bhi dale abacus ke related to hamara profile aana chahiye. Ye bol rahe ho.
Customer: Nahi nahi hamara hamara nahi aaya to bhi chalta hai lekin baki ka aa raha hai to phir baki ka sabka aa raha hai na.
Customer: Jaise jaise abhi mai aapne kya bataya 13 kaise kaise ho.
Customer: Baki wo dale to baki logo ka aa raha hai to aapka hamara kyu nahi aa raha hai?
Executive: Hmm, aana chahiye bilkul aayega, hamare paas wo product ke naam se add kar denge rod bilkul aayega.
Executive: Aap mujhe batao koi product ka naam batao, 13 rod.
[inaudible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Profile not appearing in search results.

- Wants profile to appear for any abacus-related search.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how product names are added.

- Asked customer for product names to add.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product search, profile visibility, abacus
